# WebServiceDriver.Get Method (String, String, HttpStatusCode)
 

Execute a web service get

## Syntax

**C#**<br />
``` C#
public string Get(
	string requestUri,
	string expectedMediaType,
	HttpStatusCode expectedStatus
)
```


#### Parameters
&nbsp;<dl><dt>requestUri</dt><dd>Type: <a href="http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf" target="_blank">System.String</a><br />The request uri</dd><dt>expectedMediaType</dt><dd>Type: <a href="http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf" target="_blank">System.String</a><br />The type of media you are expecting back</dd><dt>expectedStatus</dt><dd>Type: <a href="http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/f92ssyy1" target="_blank">System.Net.HttpStatusCode</a><br />Assert a specific status code was returned</dd></dl>

#### Return Value
Type: <a href="http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf" target="_blank">String</a><br />The response content as a string
